title: Diamond Nakshi Style Pendant - Addigai Design
materials: G color). Features Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced shine and durability.
features: Contemporary pendant designed in a Nakshi style, featuring floral and teardrop motifs completely encrusted with sparkling diamonds. The piece showcases a brilliant cut and modern style. It can be paired with a gold chain or a string of pearls.
colors: Yellow Gold and Dazzling White Diamonds.
occasions: or to add a touch of elegance to everyday wear. Suitable for weddings
description: This pendant offers a unique blend of traditional Nakshi design with a modern diamond setting. It's lightweight, comfortable to wear, and radiates sophistication. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures lasting shine and durability, making it a timeless investment. It's a statement piece, a symbol of refined taste, that will become a treasured family heirloom.
